Barnet – Chipping Barnet Library to be partially turned into commercial offices.

North Somerset – 5 libraries ( Long Ashton, Pill, Winscombe, Worle, and Yatton) to be Open+ at cost of £820k. 17 jobs lost. One library to be run by parish council. Worle Library to collocate with children’s centre. £250k cut p.a.
Torfaen – Consultation on £250k cut. Opening hours cuts, possible closure.
Bath – £800k p.a. cut. Bath Central Library to be closed and co-located with council offices in Manvers Street. Midsomer Norton Library to be closed and co-located with One Stop Shop.
Sunderland – Aim to reduce total libraries budget to £509k pa. by 2019/2020.
Barnet – Childs Hill Library to be run by learning disability charities, resident’s charity will run Mill Hill Library, Inclusion Barnet will run East Barnet and South Friern Libraries.
Darlington – Mobile library withdrawn, Decision on if Cockerton Library will close or turn volunteer will be made in January, Crown Street Library’s fate will also be decided in January.
Durham – Newton Aycliffe Library moved into co-location with leisure centre.
Harrow – Roxteth Library to be redeveloped, linked to residential scheme.
